channel.title: Logseq on Martin Kubečka
channel.description: Recent content in Logseq on Martin Kubečka

item.title: CVE-2025-56683: DOM-based Cross-Site Scripting Leading to Remote Code Execution in Logseq application
item.description: A DOM-based XSS vulnerability in Logseq version 0.10.9 allows Remote Code Execution by injecting malicious JavaScript through unsanitized plugin README content combined with insufficient protocol validation.
